mapper.insert: insert into category(memberno, categoryname, admin) values (#{memberno}, #{categoryname}, 1)
mapper.select: select c.categoryname, g.groupname from category as c join groups as g on c.categoryno = #{g.categoryno};
mapper.insert: insert into groups(categoryno, memberno, groupname) values (1, #{memberno}, #{groupname})

insert into groupboard (groupno, categoryno, memberno, boarddate, boardcontents, boardnotice, boardlike, boardhate, requestboolean) values (#{groupno}, #{categoryno}, #{memberno}, now(), #{boardcontents}, 0, 0, 0, 0)
